casebody.data:
State of Connecticut
v.
Jose Salazar Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 27, 2016

David J. Reich, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Emily D. Trudeau, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 151 Conn. App. 463, 93 A.3d 1192 (2014), is denied.
